trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the `configProtectedData` configuration section.
The `configProtectedData` configuration file section contains a collection of protected data providers in its `providers` element.
You can use the Aspnet_regiis.exe tool to encrypt and decrypt configuration sections.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection"></xref> class using default settings.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.

Gets or sets the name of the default <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection.Providers"></xref> collection property.

The name of the default <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection.Providers"></xref> collection property.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection"></xref> collection of all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> objects in all participating configuration files.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection"></xref> collection of all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> objects in all participating configuration files.
